channel.title: How 2 Start my Source Pimpscape?
channel.description:
Well... my mate told me... when ive downloaded pimpscape.. u extract the files 2 my documents? now Wut do it do??
if ive dne somet wrong .. please tell me how 2.
if u get my server up and running ill pay u real runescape cash .. no lie tyvm =]

item.title: How 2 Start my Source Pimpscape?
item.dc:creator: @eggg eggg
item.description:
@eggg wrote:

what ikiliki said depends on your version of java
if you have JDK the code in there is different
i reccomend you have a look here : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html

edit: and possibly do that stuff beforehand, that way it ensures you will have a much more smooth ride =)

Read full topic

item.title: How 2 Start my Source Pimpscape?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Nope its already good
Thought yours wasnt fixed yet

Ok now just run the runserver.bat

item.title: How 2 Start my Source Pimpscape?
item.dc:creator: @son_of_devil son of devil
item.description:
@son_of_devil wrote:

1 minute plz…
i right click and press edit

then this comes up…

@echo off
title Pimpscape Server
javaw -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-javaw-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

do i change that?

Read full topic

item.title: How 2 Start my Source Pimpscape?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Right click on the Runserver.bat
Click edit and replace the code if its not like

@echo off title [Name you give it] java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar;./Server.jar server

Than run your runserver.bat
And your server is online

I dont want real rs cash,
Im doing this for free

Helping is my hobby

Read full topic
